parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the extension line whose gap to get

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True if using the document default value of the gap, false if not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Gap value in system units (see Remarks )

title: IDisplayDimension.GetWitnessLineGap
description: Gets the gap of the specified dimension extension line.
signature:
System.Boolean GetWitnessLineGap( 
   System.Int16
WitnessIndex
,
   out System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   out System.Double
Gap
)

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index of the extension line whose gap to get

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True if using the document default value of the gap, false if not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Gap
parameters.description: Gap value in system units (see Remarks )

returns: True if the operation succeeds, false if not
remarks:
The UseDoc argument is dependent on the detailing standard. You can retrieve the document default value using the
document-level user-preference swDetailingWitnessLineGap
.
The Gap argument is the document default value if UseDoc is true; otherwise, the value returned is the locally set value.

examples.title: Get and Set Dimension Extension Lines Gap (VBA)
